transArray.content: The service attitude is very good. The house is clean and comfortable. It's very quiet. I completed the pre-exam preparation sprint efficiently during the three days of preparing for the national examination. Thank you. There are also a lot of fresh tangerines to eat. The breakfast in the restaurant is also very good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your positive recognition of our room! Every city always has reasons for people to miss it, and every season has scenery that we canâ€™t let go of. I hope Orange Beijing Shaoyaoju University of International Business and Economics Hotel will be the warmest and unique existence in your memories! We look forward to your visit every time and wish you success in your work!
